ELEMENT.AUTHOR: Zoovy
ELEMENT.TITLE: Article style - small image, text, subcats and products
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: Designed to be used as an article page that cross-promotes products mentioned (vertical product list down the side). Will also list subcategories or sibling categories if no subcats are present (categories list in reverse alphabetical order so that they can be listed by day [safe name should be YYYYMMDD_article_title]).
